product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Tri Race Shorts - Women's
long_description: Designed for both training and racing, the women's Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Tri Race Shorts help you keep your cool under pressure thanks to innovative In-R-Cool(R) fabric. In-R-Cool fabric with coldblack(R) technology reflects heat away from the body to regulate temperature, feels cool to the touch and provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Lycra(R) spandex helps shorts retain their original compression level. TRI quick-dry chamois offers anti-odor and thermal regulating properties. Stitch construction provides next-to-skin comfort. Plush elastic leg grippers and a flattering, wide waistband add comfort. Stretch drawcord at waist fine-tunes the fit. Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Tri Race Shorts are designed for those who prefer a lower rise and shorter length. Easy-access envelope pocket.
short_description: Designed for both training and racing, the women's Pearl Izumi Elite In-R-Cool Tri Race Shorts help you keep your cool under pressure thanks to innovative In-R-Cool(R) fabric.
